CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, June 27, 1953, pg. 3 reads: "Soho Workers Picket - Staff workers of the Soho Community House who went out on strike last week, picketed the main building of the agency at 2358 Fifth Avenue. Here two Soho employes and representatives of the CIO, with which Local 230, Government and Civic Employes Organizing Committee, representing the Soho staff, is affiliated, make an unprecedented picket line before the agency.  They are, left to right: Doris Keller, chairman of the Soho local; Thelma Ruther, special CIO representative, and Kenneth Hopkins, a Soho staff member.  With their backs to the camera are Rose Mary McGuire, a CIO representative, and John Rabzyminski, organizer. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Kenneth Hopkins, Thelma Ruther, and Doris Keller, wearing sandwich boards inscribed "On Strike Soho Board Unfair," picketing in front of the Soho Community House, 2358 Fifth Avenue
